ComicInfo.Series: The Second Life of Doctor Mirage
ComicInfo.Title: Unfinished Business - Part 2
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:30:32. [Issue ID 153538]
ComicInfo.Tags: Carmen Ruiz,Brad,Chris Taylor,Doctor Mirage (also as Master Darque),Professor Mabry,Arthur
ComicInfo.Summary: Carmen and Hwen have to exorcise a vengeful spirit slain by Master Darque from the mysterious Thornton manor. The only way to fight a haunted house? Blow it up! However, a wall of zombies and Carmen's drooling duplicate won't give up without a fight.
